name: Solo
title: soloist.ai
payoff: Launch your business with a free website
shortDescription: Solo is a free AI-powered website creator designed to help entrepreneurs and small businesses establish an online presence quickly and efficiently. Users can launch a professional-looking website without needing coding skills. An example use case is a local bakery using Solo to create an online catalog and start taking orders online.
cons: May not scale well for large businesses

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Weebly
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Easy to use, good for small stores
